title: duong.nh
author: duong.nh
content: Can you evaluate Artificial Intelligent Cryptocurrency Prediction and Smart Trade Suggestion - AICF?. is it number 1 in the market?App link: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1585131756Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1piOwZt8rE&list=PLjz54pmykCBdMro4BYcRaFO3lzNbHFBpnApp Language: English, Tiếng Việt, Français, 韓国語, 한국인, Pyccкий, 中国人, لغة عربيةAICF DESCRIPTIONThe AICF application is artificial intelligence investment decision support system for cryptocurrency investment. The application uses powerful sophisticated algorithms (artificial intelligence, machine learning, multiple weight evaluation, forecast/suggest result evaluation, multiple bots, …) to analyze, evaluate and calculate forecast and trade order suggestion. This is great tool to assist you for your cryptocurrency investment decision. The app supports following features:1. Smart Trade Suggestion:* Support 28 smart trade strategies. Each strategy analyzes and evaluates dynamically market information combining with some specific technical indicators in anytime to give better buy/sell suggestion for each cryptocurrency.* Support more than 100 future best cryptocurrencies (*/USDT).* Support future market where you can take profit in the uptrend and downtrend also. In the case you invest in spot market (traditional market) you can use buy order suggestion to buy for holding and use sell order suggestion to close the order.* Suggest trade information: buy/sell market order, cut loss percent to cut loss automatically and trailing stop to take profit automatically in anytime.* Support to identify market sideway and others to import investment effectiveness.* Support multiple bots to analyze, evaluate and simulate to trade.* Show investment effectiveness evaluation information to user.* Notify new trade suggestion real time by apple notification (from V2.1 version)2. Artificial Intelligence Cryptocurrency Forecast:* Use artificial intelligent, machine learning and other sophisticated algorithms to analyze & evaluate dynamically more than 45 factors (technical indicator, economic information, expert, ...) for each cryptocurrency to give the forecast. The evaluation factors are evaluated frequently to remove or add more if necessary.* AICF can learn from the past forecasts to improve forecast quality. * Support more than 300 best cryptocurrencies (*/USDT) such as: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Stellar, Dash,…* Support 4 forecast periods for each cryptocurrency: 4 hours, day, week and month.* Show cryptocurrency forecast price and forecast percent.* Show price forecast accuracy and trend forecast accuracy for recent forecasts.* Sort/Filter/Favorite forecasts to find out which is best investment chance in anytime.3. General Cryptocurrency Information:* Real time cryptocurrency tracking* Current price/change percent* Price candlestick/line chart with basic technical indicators* Cryptocurrencies supply information* Change percent statistic (24Hr, day, week, month, 3 months, 6 months, 9 months and year)* Real time price cryptocurrency Converter* Sort/Filter/Favorite information4. Investment Portfolio Management* Support future investment portfolio management.* Support price average investment portfolio.* Show current total profit/loss information.* Show 24hr profit/loss information.* Support price/volume changing notification in anytime (from V2.1 version).5. Price/Volume Notification System and Others* Support price/volume changing notification in anytime (from V2.1 version).* Support fast access from activities history.* Support multiple language: English, Tiếng Việt, Français, 韓国語, 한국인, Pyccкий, 中国人, لغة عربية* Others.This is great tool to assist you for your cryptocurrency investment decision. The data, forecast, suggestion is published in this application have been researched with utmost care.Please note that the cryptocurrencies and comparable investment are generally associated with high risk. A total loss of the invested capital can’t be excluded.  We are trying day by day to give you best data/forecast/suggestion as much as possible. The application assists you to make investment decision only. You are still responsible for all profit/loss of your investment. Please do your own research. Furthermore, we point out that the published data do not represent an invitation to buy or sell individual crypto assets. The application provide you reference only, you should evaluate good information or not. Please forgive the published data if it’s not good.We reserve the right to modify, restrict or discontinue the offer at any time or to convert it into a chargeable offer. We do not assume any liability, regardless of the legal reason. As far as it is legally possible, claims for damages are excluded.If you have any question please don’t hesitate to contact with us!Thanks and best regards!support@aicfhost.com
